Roy LaGrone (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi dijitalụ
Ọrụ ya, nké sitere na nnukwu foto, ihe nkiri na ntinye vidiyo, na-agụnyekarị echiche efu dị mgbagwoju anya nkè oghere atọ nkè e ji ihe ndị a chọtara rụọ.
LaGrone gụrụ akwụkwọ na Atlanta College of Art (BFA, 1989), na Savannah College of Art and Design (MFA, kọmputa arts, 2000).
E gosipụtara ọrụ LaGronez n'ọtụtụ ebe gụnyere Smithsonian Institution Ancostia Museum; SIGGRAPH; na Lyndon Baines Johnson Presidential Library and Museum.
